pages.text: The Armour Upgrader is the primary item in armour upgrading. Once crafted it needs to have applied another item in an avil in order to give a type to it!

pages.title: Types
pages.text: There are 2 types of Armour Upgraders. Ability (combine the Armour Upgrader with a Dragon Egg in an anvil) and Effect (combine the Armour Upgrader with any Potion in an anvil).
